C

calculateGain() - Method in class content.BookMaker
Calculates the gain of the BookMaker from gambling 1) If the bet Horse come first the gain calculated as betAmount * percentToBet * 3.5 2) If the bet Horse come second the gain calculated as betAmount * percentToBet * 2.5 3) If the bet Horse come third the gain calculated as betAmount * percentToBet * 1.5 4) Otherwise the gain calculating from betAmount * percentToBet
calculateGain() - Method in class content.Gambler
Calculates he gain for this Gambler by the following rules: 1) If the betHorse came at the first position then the gambler got his bet * 10 2) If the betHorse came at the second position then the gambler got his bet * 5 3) If the betHorse came at the third position then the gambler got his bet * 2 4) Otherwise the gambler lose only his bet from his amount.
calculateGain() - Method in interface utils.Gainable
 
calculateHorseAge() - Method in class content.Horse
Calculates the age of this horse according to his birthDate by using Instance of Calendar Object: Calendar calendar = Calendar.getInstance(); the age calculated by: the current year - the year of the buithDate Please read the documentation of Calendar for more information
calculateTotalPoints() - Method in class content.Horse
Calculates the total points for this Horse in all Competitions
calculateWiningTimes() - Method in class content.Horse
Calculates the total wining times of this Horse in all competitions
checkHorseFitness(Horse) - Method in class content.Competition
Checks the horse fitness.
compare(Horse, Horse) - Method in class utils.HorseComparator
The method compare to Object by Given criteria: Amount of winnings * weightOfWiningTimes + total points * weightOf TotalPoints + PopularityRate * weightOfPopularityRate
compare(HorseInCompetition, HorseInCompetition) - Method in class utils.HorseInCompetitionByFinishingTime
Comparator of Competition that using Finishing time to sort Horses in Competition from the 1 to the last
compare(Trainer, Trainer) - Method in class utils.TrainerComparatorBySuccessRate
The Comparator for trainer that use trainers success rate for sorting them descending
compareTo(BookMaker) - Method in class content.BookMaker
overrides the compareTo method by comparing the primary fields
